mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.select: SELECT AR.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM reply AS AR INNER JOIN member AS M ON AR.memberId = M.id WHERE AR.id = #{id} AND AR.displayStatus = 1 AND AR.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET delStatus = 1, delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
